text: Paul Pataer (26 November 1938 â€“ 13 February 2025) was a Belgian politician. As a member of politicap party Vooruit (SP) and served as a member of the Senate from 1985 to 1991 and from 1992 to 1995. From 1985 to 1991 as provincial senator for East Flanders and from 1992 to 1995 as co-opted senator.Laureys, V., Van den Wijngaert, M., De geschiedenis van de Belgische Senaat 1831-1995, Lannoo, 1999 In 1996 he became chairman of the Human Rights League and was succeeded by in 2004. Pataer died in Ghent on 13 February 2025, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:Belgian politicians Category:1938 births Category:2025 deaths Category:People from Ghent
title: Paul Pataer
